alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 10:14AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FIRE DANGER STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... Elevated fire weather conditions are expected today as relative humidity values drop below 25 percent this afternoon. Sustained winds 13 to 18 mph and gusts 20 to 25 mph will accompany dry conditions. Current fuel moisture readings are in the 10 to 15% range across inland portions of southeast Georgia and southeast South Carolina, which will continue to drop heading into the afternoon as conditions become dry and breezy.
info.instruction: Please refer to your local burn permitting authorities on whether you can burn. If you do, you are advised to use extreme caution.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Hampton; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper
